errors.videoUpload: Video upload failed. Please check the video URL and ensure it is accessible.
errors.invalidVideoFormat: The video format is not supported. Please use MP4 format.
errors.domainVerification: Domain verification failed. Ensure your domain is verified with TikTok.
errors.accessTokenExpired: Access token has expired. Please refresh your token.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before making more requests.
errors.invalidShopeeLink: The Shopee affiliate link is invalid. Please check the link format.
errors.captionGenerationFailed: Failed to generate caption. Please try again later.
errors.hashtagNormalizationError: Error normalizing hashtags. Please ensure they are formatted correctly.
errors.generalError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
